item.description:
Teaching platform for Kleros, with a decentralized course, fully defined by smart contracts. In the course, the student can make projects and submit them to the course for validation, in addition to taking tests to prove their learning. 
Notes: 
1- The project was based on another open source work I did for the RSK blockchain. 
2- It is deployed on RSK Network. I didnâ€™t have time to re-deploy everything to Ethereum during the hackathon.
item.tags: rsk, ethereum, blockchain, smart contracts, kleros
item.title: Kleros Academy - EthCC Hackathon
